title: How to Make Charlotte Majestic

steps.headline: Grease the charlotte mould.
steps.description: Butter is the best agent for greasing here.

steps.headline: Place the crystallised or candied fruits in the base of the charlotte mould.
Line the rest of the mould with the sponge fingers.
Prepare the Bavarian cream using a flavour of your choice.
steps.description: See How to make Bavarian cream for instructions on what to do.

steps.headline: Pour the Bavarian cream into the lined charlotte mould.
Finish by covering the cream with more sponge fingers.
Place the mould into the refrigerator.
Turn out the mould by dipping the outside of the mould quickly into hot water and then flipping the dish over onto a serving plate just prior to serving.

text: Grease the charlotte mould. Butter is the best agent for greasing here. Place the crystallised or candied fruits in the base of the charlotte mould.  Line the rest of the mould with the sponge fingers.  Prepare the Bavarian cream using a flavour of your choice. See How to make Bavarian cream for instructions on what to do. Pour the Bavarian cream into the lined charlotte mould.  Finish by covering the cream with more sponge fingers.  Place the mould into the refrigerator. Chill until it sets. Turn out the mould by dipping the outside of the mould quickly into hot water and then flipping the dish over onto a serving plate just prior to serving.
